snippet: The attack came in two waves this week by a hacker or team of hackers presenting themselves as Saudi Arabian.
abstract: Credit card details of more than 20,000 Israelis are exposed on the Internet in two waves by a hacker or a team of hackers who say they are Saudis.
lead_paragraph: The attack came in two waves this week by a hacker or team of hackers presenting themselves as Saudi Arabian.

headline.seo: Israeli Credit Card Numbers Exposed in Cyberattack
headline.main: Cyberattack Exposes 20,000 Israeli Credit Card Numbers and Details About Users
headline.print_headline: Cyberattack Exposes 20,000 Israeli Credit Card Numbers and Details About Users
